alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 30 at 8:44AM CDT until March 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 75 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS UNION IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA HEMPSTEAD HOWARD LAFAYETTE LITTLE RIVER MILLER NEVADA SEVIER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 PARISHES IN NORTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA CALDWELL GRANT JACKSON LA SALLE LINCOLN OUACHITA UNION WINN IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BIENVILLE BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE DE SOTO NATCHITOCHES RED RIVER SABINE WEBSTER IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS BOWIE CASS GREGG HARRISON MARION PANOLA RUSK SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SHELBY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARCADIA, ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BERNICE, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, CARTHAGE, CENTER, CLARKS, COLFAX, COLUMBIA, COUSHATTA, DE QUEEN, DIERKS, DRY PRONG, EL DORADO, FARMERVILLE, GIBSLAND, GRAYSON, HAYNESVILLE, HEMPHILL, HENDERSON, HOMER, HOPE, HUGHES SPRINGS, JEFFERSON, JENA, JONESBORO, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LOGANSPORT, LONGVIEW, MAGNOLIA, MANSFIELD, MANY, MARSHALL, MARTIN, MIDWAY, MINDEN, MINERAL SPRINGS, MONROE, MONTGOMERY, NASHVILLE, NATCHITOCHES, OLLA, PINELAND, PLEASANT HILL, PRESCOTT, QUEEN CITY, RINGGOLD, RUSTON, SAN AUGUSTINE, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, STONEWALL, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, WINNFIELD, AND ZWOLLE.
